welcome_message_body: Welcome to Capivari, Brazil! Prepare to be enchanted by the city's lush greenery, charming architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Capivari has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viracopos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Campo dos Amarais-Prefeito Francisco Amaral State Airport, serving domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
